description.value:
Luminescent panel implanted into the skin of the palm of the hand. Near-invisible until activated through squeezing the hand. Acts as a soft light that illuminates objects in a few centimetres, allowing for delicate tasks to be done in the dark without giving away the user's presence.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
